Posts.Content: how old are you? did you have a double mastectomy? talk to the people at American Cancer Society? my oncologist told me that is was and is the nerves reaction. I had a radical single mastectomy three years ago and I am now 35 year old. I had radation and alot of scar tissue do the to fact that I had 19 lymph nodes removed. email me at --- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, email address removed. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html ---
Posts.Title: do You- Post Mastectomy Pain Syndrome
